name: Rooting For You (tanukisuitup)
description:
Help Mello save her plant friend by using her cactus water holding ability to bring water back.

Controls:

Left: A or Xbox Controller Analog Left Stick

Right: D or Xbox Controller Analog Left Stick

Jump / Double Jump: Space or Xbox Controller A button

Swing: Hold Left Mouse Button or Xbox Right Trigger

Gameplay:

Jump into the water and once it's all absorbed, take it back to your plant friend before it drains away.

Once you pick up water, you have to take it back to your plant friend before getting more.

Art / Design: Slydaniels

Programming / Design: tanukisuitup

Music: Can't Cook (Instrumental) by Sly Clarke
